c74object.name: o.button2switch
c74object.digest: Turn input button into a switch
c74object.description: Each 0/1 input sequence will cycle the output from 0 to 1 (similar to togedge).

objarg.name: starting-point
objarg.description: Sets the cycle starting point, which can be either 0 or 1. Just like the set message.
objarg.discussion: Note: Typing a list into an object box automatically identifies it as a pack object. Therefore, you may omit the word pack from the object box provided that you type in a list of arguments that has at least two items and begins with a number.

method.name: int
method.description: Cycles the output value from 0 to 1 whenever a 1 is received.

method.name: set
method.description: The set message sets the cycle starting point (0 or 1), whithout outputting any values.
